name: seo-content-generation
description: SERP analysis to publication-ready articles. SEO-optimized content with proper structure, meta tags, and keyword placement. Use when: writing blog posts, creating landing page copy, optimizing content for search.

inputs.name: type
inputs.description: Content type: blog, landing, product, comparison

chainOfThought: 1. Research SERP for target keyword. 2. Analyze competitor content structure. 3. Identify content gaps. 4. Create outline with H2/H3 structure. 5. Write with keyword density 1-2%. 6. Add meta description and title tag.
